# pax-select-option

The `pax-select-option` goes inside a `pax-select`.

## Usage

See `pax-select` for usage.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `abbreviation` | `abbreviation` | Add an additional abbreviation to a select option.                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`     | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select option.            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `selected`     | `selected`     | Marks the select option, whose value is submitted with the form data.  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`        | `value`        | The value of the select option, which is submitted with the form data. | `string`  | `undefined` |
